2901310.name: 奇天烈相談ダイヤル
2901310.detailed_description:
あらすじ


舞台は怪異が実在する1994年の日本。

かつては畏怖の対象であった怪異が
昨今ではイタズラや犯罪に利用され、
真贋入り乱れる世の中となってしまった。

アナタは、都内に設立された無料電話サービス
『奇天烈お悩み相談室』の新人相談員・ミサコとなり、
まずはお試しで1週間、活動をしてみることにする。

ゲームシステム


《矛盾を探し　怪異であるかを判定する》

本作は『Papers, Please』から着想を得た怪異判定ADVだ。

相談員のアナタは、
資料と相談者の話を照らし合わせて矛盾を探し、
相談者の悩みが怪異の仕業かそうでないかを判定する。

矛盾がなければホンモノ、
ひとつでも矛盾があればニセモノだ。


《ランダムで決定する人物と相談内容》

相談者・相談対象の怪異・相談内容は
すべてランダムで決定される。

登場する怪異は全部で100体だ。
プレイする度に変化する相談を次々と解決し、
100体すべてコンプリートしよう。


《難易度を自由に設定可能》

今作では制限時間の長さやライフの最大値、
メモ機能の自動化・手動化などを
プレイヤー自身で設定することができる。

設定した難易度によって
毎日の自己評価にボーナススコアが加算される。

クリア後にはDからSのランクが付けられるので、
プレイに慣れてきたら高難易度を目指してみよう。


《周回プレイのスパイス　達人モード》

相談室には、相談員を怪異から守るために
特別なチカラが込められた『清めの塩』が用意されている。

ランクA以上を獲得すると解放される『達人モード』では、
この清めの塩をスルーすることで
ワザと怪異に襲われるという酔狂なプレイを楽しめる。

やって来るのは『話を聞いた相手の元に現れる』怪異だ。
もし相談者がこのタイプの怪異を相談してきたら
怪異資料をくまなく確認することを忘れずに…。

ゲーム概要


○タイトル　　　　　　奇天烈相談ダイヤル
○ジャンル　　　　　　怪異判定アドベンチャー
○プレイ時間　　　　　2～10時間（設定した難易度によって大幅に変動します）
○ゲームオーバー　　　あり
○エンディング分岐　　あり（分岐に関する情報はオンラインマニュアルをご覧ください）
○対象年齢　　　　　　12歳以上推奨

ご注意


この物語はフィクションです。

実在する人物・地名・団体・事件等とは一切関係ありません。
特定の思想・信条を肯定する内容ではありません。

直接的な描写はありませんが
暴力性・残虐性・犯罪行為を含む文章及び
人によっては恐怖を感じかねない表現が含まれています。

操作方法について


オンラインマニュアルをご覧ください。
本ゲームはキーボードによる文字入力を必要とします。

ゲーム実況/配信について


公式サイトにガイドラインがございます。
ご利用の際は必ずご一読ください。
規約は予告なく変更となる場合があります。

投げ銭について


当ゲームはすべて無料でプレイできます。
面白いと思っていただけましたら投げ銭をよろしくお願いいたします。
webサイトから「奇天烈相談ダイヤル」のBOOTHページまでお越しください。

開発者より


皆さまこんにちは、本ゲーム開発者の笹森簀児です。

今作は『Papers, Please』というインディーゲームからインスピレーションを受け、
突発的に開発を始めて、5ヶ月で完成させました。

物語の時代設定ですが、我々の知る90年代ではなく
『70年代に生きる人々が、当時に思い描いていたかもしれない90年代』となっています。
ちょっと複雑ですが、パラレルワールドのお話だと思ってください。　

今作はゲームの難易度をプレイヤー自身で設定できる仕様にしました。
設定によってはご自身でメモを取っていただきますので、予め用意しておくことをオススメします。

サークル初となる『周回プレイが前提のゲーム』ですので、ぜひ何度もプレイしてみてくださいね。

制作（敬称略）


○シナリオ/演出/スクリプト/CM・キャライラスト/エンドロールナレーション
　笹森簀児
○CM・システムボイス/ジングル
　マザえもん
○エンドロールBGM作曲
　真島こころ
○企画・開発
　法螺会

2913040.name: Back
2913040.detailed_description:
《Back》is a full-motion live action horror game. Players will take on the role of the “Ren Xing” and experience a suspenseful and bizarre journey in the game. In the game, the player will explore a huge villa. The villa hides a huge conspiracy, players will face different emergencies to choose different ways to respond, and different ways to respond will determine the final outcome.

Background

Ren Xing as a real estate agent (thought at the time), came to a villa for field shooting, but accidentally fell into a horrible plot, players need to choose how to escape the villa. Finally through different choices to start different game endings. Whether the puzzle can be solved, or forever trapped in the villa, depends on the player's search and choice during the process.

Game features

Puzzle


The game sets up a number of search links, players need to remember the content of each search, search content has a lot of information to help players decide how to choose in each life and death choice link.

Select


According to the content of the search link in the game, the player needs to choose when facing danger, if the choice is wrong, it is...

Reversal


The opening and ending of the game are completely unimaginable to the player, they are not really themselves, friends are not real friends, enemies are not real enemies

2940890.name: Carrion Fields
2940890.detailed_description:
Carrion Fields is one of the longest-running online RPGs in the world, a hardcore, text-based grandfather to games like World of Warcraft and Everquest. It's a cross between a tabletop roleplaying game and an MMORPG.

Enter Thera, a dark, fantasy land roiled by eternal wars among mortal factions and gods alike. No one is ever truly safe from monsters, fellow adventurers, or the inexorable ravages of time.

Make your mark on Thera using your wits, your weapons, diverse schools of magic, or by drawing power from the gods themselves. Write a story for your character and give them life in a vast world over 30 years in the making, filled to the brim with secrets and mysteries that you can uncover and use to your advantage.

Carrion Fields is completely free and run by a staff of dedicated volunteer "Immortals," who act as Game Masters and roleplay as the world's gods. Overhead is covered by dedicated players' donations. No pay-to-play. No paying for in-game perks or cosmetic items. We don't care how much money you have - just how fast you can think and how good your story is.

- Our world is always growing. Carrion Fields boasts hundreds of PvE quests, puzzles, raids, dungeons, and other areas, with more always in the works.

- Carrion Fields features a nuanced and strategic PvP system, including "cabal" factions' never-ending battles for power.

- Players can choose from 21 races, 17 classes, 7 player-run cabals, and numerous unique customization options and opportunities that ensure no two characters need ever be alike.

- Necromancers can become undead creatures of great power: Liches, Vampyres, Wights or Mummies. Shapeshifters can learn to transform into powerful or even mythical beasts. Warriors can gain fearsome skills by specializing in weapons and learn incredible abilities from warrior-monks. Thieves can learn to mix poisonous brews and set traps. Rangers can gain mastery over specific terrains, use archery or travel with beast companions. And much more!

- Compete with other players to discover or plunder powerful limited and legendary items.

- No matter how much power you amass, no one survives Thera. Characters can last for hundreds of hours of gameplay, but all are doomed to die of old age - if they survive that long.

- Role-play is required and enforced in Carrion Fields. Everyone you meet in Thera is fighting their own battle, writing their own story, and hoping, just as you are, to come out on top.

Ready to join us? Now, all you need to do is decide:

By what name do you wish to be mourned?

What is Carrion Fields

Carrion Fields is a text-based MUD (multi-user dungeon) that was created in 1994. It is an online game with enforced roleplay. Everything is done in-character to maximize the immersive world you'll try to survive in.

  • Founded: January of 1994
  • Codebase: Rom (19+ years away from Rom 2.3)
  • Theme: RP / PK
  • Areas: 250+ original areas (23k rooms)
  • Helpfiles: 2,000+
  • Races: 21 (plus a seasonal race!)
  • Classes: 17
  • Cabals (Clans): 7
  • Quests: 300+
  • Absolutely, 100% free - no pay-for-perks
  • Customization: deep class-based specialization

Is Carrion Fields really free?

Yes. COMPLETELY free. There is no pay-to-play, there is no pay-to-win. You can't buy any in-game benefits. Your success is left up to your skill and dedication.

Roleplay

Carrion Fields has enforced roleplay. Meaning you play as your character, not yourself. You may be a righteous paladin annihilating wicked souls from the world, or a sly thief attempting to fence stolen goods - but no matter what you will always be in-character. Carrion Fields aims for an immersive experience that includes PvP (player vs. player) and PvE (player vs. environment) while expecting valid roleplay at all times.

PvP

Want to try your hand at a complex and competitive system? Carrion Fields offers a system of PvP that feels like it is a natural extension of its fantasy world. There are no true safe areas, nobody is completely immune to violence. You might try to stay safe within your class's guildhall, but what if your foe is strong enough to murder the well-trained guild guard?

PvE

The world in Carrion Fields is vast. You might sit in a tavern and drink, discussing stories and tales with your compatriots. You also might leave the safety of the populated cities and venture into vast subterranean caverns filled with unknown danger, or explore lost vaults with puzzling magic, or try your hand at facing the ancient dragons which defend their lairs with awe-inspiring power.

In Carrion Fields grouping up is not unusual, as sometimes it is the only way to survive in dangerous areas.

A completely free online multiplayer text-based RPG game. Experience roleplay, PvP, PvE, and more in a vast fantasy world with in-depth history. Enjoy 21 races and 17 classes in an ever-evolving world.

Carrion Fields is a unique blend of roleplaying and complex, hardcore PvP combat that has been running continuously, and 100% free, for over 30 years.

An unforgiving, text-based world with a supportive community. Join us for a real challenge and real rewards: adrenaline-pumping battles, memorable quests, and stories that will stick with you for a lifetime.

Additional Information and Help

Carrion Fields is a complex game and the learning curve can feel steep. We recommend you join our discord and read through our site to get an idea of how to maximize your chances of success in this brutal yet fulfilling world. You can also customize your UI and adjust it to whatever suits your tastes by looking through Mudlet's magnificent documentation.

No pay-to-play. No paying for in-game perks or cosmetic items. We don't care how much money you have - just how fast you can think and how good your story is.

- Our world is always growing. Carrion Fields boasts hundreds of PvE quests, puzzles, raids, dungeons, and other areas, with more always in the works.

- Carrion Fields features a nuanced and strategic PvP system, including "cabal" factions' never-ending battles for power.

- Players can choose from 21 races, 17 classes, 7 player-run cabals, and numerous unique customization options and opportunities that ensure no two characters need ever be alike.

- Necromancers can become undead creatures of great power: Liches, Vampyres, Wights or Mummies. Shapeshifters can learn to transform into powerful or even mythical beasts. Warriors can gain fearsome skills by specializing in weapons and learn incredible abilities from warrior-monks. Thieves can learn to mix poisonous brews and set traps. Rangers can gain mastery over specific terrains, use archery or travel with beast companions. And much more!

- Compete with other players to discover or plunder powerful limited and legendary items.

- No matter how much power you amass, no one survives Thera. Characters can last for hundreds of hours of gameplay, but all are doomed to die of old age - if they survive that long.

- Role-play is required and enforced in Carrion Fields. Everyone you meet in Thera is fighting their own battle, writing their own story, and hoping, just as you are, to come out on top.

Ready to join us? Now, all you need to do is decide:

By what name do you wish to be mourned?

What is Carrion Fields

Carrion Fields is a text-based MUD (multi-user dungeon) that was created in 1994. It is an online game with enforced roleplay. Everything is done in-character to maximize the immersive world you'll try to survive in.

  • Founded: January of 1994
  • Codebase: Rom (19+ years away from Rom 2.3)
  • Theme: RP / PK
  • Areas: 250+ original areas (23k rooms)
  • Helpfiles: 2,000+
  • Races: 21 (plus a seasonal race!)
  • Classes: 17
  • Cabals (Clans): 7
  • Quests: 300+
  • Absolutely, 100% free - no pay-for-perks
  • Customization: deep class-based specialization

Is Carrion Fields really free?

Yes. COMPLETELY free. There is no pay-to-play, there is no pay-to-win. You can't buy any in-game benefits. Your success is left up to your skill and dedication.

Roleplay

Carrion Fields has enforced roleplay. Meaning you play as your character, not yourself. You may be a righteous paladin annihilating wicked souls from the world, or a sly thief attempting to fence stolen goods - but no matter what you will always be in-character. Carrion Fields aims for an immersive experience that includes PvP (player vs. player) and PvE (player vs. environment) while expecting valid roleplay at all times.

PvP

Want to try your hand at a complex and competitive system? Carrion Fields offers a system of PvP that feels like it is a natural extension of its fantasy world. There are no true safe areas, nobody is completely immune to violence. You might try to stay safe within your class's guildhall, but what if your foe is strong enough to murder the well-trained guild guard?

PvE

The world in Carrion Fields is vast. You might sit in a tavern and drink, discussing stories and tales with your compatriots. You also might leave the safety of the populated cities and venture into vast subterranean caverns filled with unknown danger, or explore lost vaults with puzzling magic, or try your hand at facing the ancient dragons which defend their lairs with awe-inspiring power.

In Carrion Fields grouping up is not unusual, as sometimes it is the only way to survive in dangerous areas.

A completely free online multiplayer text-based RPG game. Experience roleplay, PvP, PvE, and more in a vast fantasy world with in-depth history. Enjoy 21 races and 17 classes in an ever-evolving world.

Carrion Fields is a unique blend of roleplaying and complex, hardcore PvP combat that has been running continuously, and 100% free, for over 30 years.

An unforgiving, text-based world with a supportive community. Join us for a real challenge and real rewards: adrenaline-pumping battles, memorable quests, and stories that will stick with you for a lifetime.

Additional Information and Help

Carrion Fields is a complex game and the learning curve can feel steep. We recommend you join our discord and read through our site to get an idea of how to maximize your chances of success in this brutal yet fulfilling world. You can also customize your UI and adjust it to whatever suits your tastes by looking through Mudlet's magnificent documentation.
2940890.short_description: A completely free online multiplayer text-based RPG game. No pay to win, no pay for perks, COMPLETELY free. Experience roleplay, PvP, PvE, and more in a vast fantasy world with in-depth history. Enjoy 21 races and 17 classes in an ever-evolving world.

2963360.name: Chicken Game
2963360.detailed_description:
What if I, an ordinary chicken delivery man, have a chance to wins a 1-million-dollar prize?

Just as he was delivering a chicken, 'Baro' was unexpectedly invited to a couple-matching program.

The process involves four women and three men participating, choosing their preferred partners among each other. However, 'Baro' lacks charm compared to other male participants, making him unpopular among the women. How could you appeal to the women and make them choose 'Baro' despite his lack of charm?

The last day of the third day, Couples who are successfully matched can challenge the ultimate chicken game.
If they succeed, they will receive a prize of 1-million-dollar.
However, if they fail, they will have to pay a corresponding price.

What kind of ending can they reach in the battle over love and money?

is an interactive content that allows viewers to see different story endings according to their choices
The story contains a total of four genres:
romance, comedy, thriler, and mystery:
Depending on the viewer's choice, a completely different story will unfold.

This game contains content that may stimulate sexual curiosity among adolescents. Additionally, it includes scenes of alcohol consumption and slight nudity. Depending on the outcome of the game, there may be endings that involve death. Special caution is advised for adolescents.

2975160.name: Rose and Cross
2975160.detailed_description:
"Rose and Cross" is a short psychological horror in the genre of "walking simulator".

Average time to complete the game: 30 minutes




On the outskirts of a small town stands an abandoned farm, surrounded by endless cornfields. The townspeople tell terrible legends that this farm was once inhabited by a sect practicing dark rites, and that these cornfields were sown with blood and fear. The main character, obsessed with studying various sects and occult movements, goes, according to rumors, to the abandoned farm where he hopes to find what he loves so much...





ATTENTION: ATTENTION: Some individuals may experience seizures when exposed to flashes of light and flashing images, even if they have never been diagnosed with epilepsy. The game contains scenes of violence and murder that may negatively affect the psyche. Certain elements may not be suitable for all age groups. It is advised to reasonably limit the audience for the game. All coincidences are random and have no connection to reality. It is recommended to use headphones for full immersion in the game.



Game Features:

  • - "Walking Simulator" genre;
  • - The game is made on the Unreal Engine 5;
  • - Tense atmosphere;
  • - Explore an abandoned house;

2989860.name: Ells Tales: Egg
2989860.detailed_description:
Imagine waking up in a chicken coop, shackled. In front of you there is a game machine with a chicken egg and a counter. To get free from this strange place you need to show attention and wit!

FEATURES:

  • A survival horror clicker! Why not?
  • Chickens. Lots of chickens.
  • Elements of a puzzle. You'll have to use your head to save yourself and the chicken egg.
  • Separate controls for each of the arms.
  • Retro-styled graphics.

If you need a little hint, check out the news about the game's release.

2979110.name: Shadow of the School
2979110.detailed_description:
As you progress, you will need to find keys and open locked doors. Solve puzzles and find passages. A first-person game with elements of horror. Explore the school and its classes, collect batteries for your flashlight. Solve puzzles. The darkness can conceal various secrets.

The player finds himself in an abandoned school, which was once a place of study for local schoolchildren. The protagonist is a paranormal researcher who came here to solve the mystery that shrouds this gloomy location.

As the player progresses through the school, he comes across various clues about the past of this place: diary entries, old photos, and scattered study materials. All of these indicate that something tragic happened at the school that led to its closure.

With each new step, the player encounters more and more eerie signs of supernatural forces in action: shadows, sounds of footsteps, quiet whispers. As the player gets closer to solving the mystery, he begins to see visions of a little girl who appears to be a ghost.

The player must solve the mystery surrounding this girl and find out what happened at the school. Eventually, it is revealed that the girl was a victim of abuse by her classmates and her soul cannot leave this place until she finds peace.

To complete the game, the player needs to find a way to help the girl's soul reconcile with her past and leave this place. But this proves to be difficult, as the player will have to face many challenges and dangers along the way, as well as the very forces of evil that haunt the abandoned school.

Features:
- pleasant graphics;
- simple controls;
- interesting gameplay;

3030580.name: Click Click Dig: Prologue
3030580.detailed_description:
Wishlist the full game!


Join our discord


About the Game

DIGGERS!



Recruit a zany cast of diggers to help you reach the core of each planet in this Free to Play, Idle Mining Game!

PROLOGUE STORE!



Earn rubies by playing the prologue and spend them in the Prologue Shop to unlock new items like character skins in the main Click Click Dig game. The prologue also features an entirely new planet not found in the main game, new skins, new tasks, and more! Play the prologue and the main Click Click Dig in order to unlock everything!

POSITION BONUSES!



Mine strategically! Position characters to take advantage of powerful stat bonuses. Characters have a stat type that gets boosted when they're on a bonus block. They also apply bonuses to different patterns of blocks. Change the layout to boost the stats you want!

SKINS!



Every digger has multiple unlockable skins. Each skin gives an immediate, permanent bonus just for owning it. There are tons to choose from, so pick your favorite and get digging!

MINING!



Every planet has a unique ore to mine. Refine the ore into materials, then use them to craft powerful items that provide stat boosts.

And much more:
⛏️ research digging
⛏️ clicker gameplay
⛏️ tasks
⛏️ incremental progression
⛏️ benefactors
⛏️ idle progression
⛏️ planet shops
⛏️ challenge mode
⛏️ golden worms
⛏️ offline mining modes
⛏️ geode prizes
⛏️ treasure chests
⛏️ big bangs!
⛏️ free to play!

JOIN OUR DISCORD

3138460.name: WolfGirl RoomMate
3138460.detailed_description:
Dive into WolfGirl RoomMate, an engaging and daring clicker game where your mission is to build a special bond with your captivating wolf girl roommate! Accumulate "lust" points to unlock intriguing scenes, passionate dialogues, and ever-spicier moments that deepen your connection.

Every click brings you closer to unlocking new content, but you're never alone on this journey! You'll also get to collect a variety of cute little creatures as automatic upgrades, each with unique abilities and different stats, helping you generate "lust" points even when you're not actively playing. These adorable companions not only add a strategic layer to the gameplay but also bring a touch of sweetness to your progress.

Key Features:

  • Interactive gallery: Collect and revisit every special scene with your wolf girl, viewable at any time in the unlocked image gallery.

  • Animal-themed upgrades: Utilize a range of charming little creatures, each with unique stats, to boost your "lust" points automatically and accelerate your progress.

  • Surprise mini-game: Test your clicking speed in a random mini-game that pops up unexpectedly, giving you the chance to earn a burst of bonus points.

  • Engaging scenes and dialogues: Unlock new conversations and intense scenes with your wolf girl, exploring every facet of your evolving relationship.

  • Collect Cute achievement!:

1357830.name: Arcana: Heat and Cold. Season 1
1357830.detailed_description:
Message from the developer:
Well, no more screwing around. It's time for the full NSFW game!
There are two descriptions waiting for you down below. One is short, and the other one contains all the interesting details. I hope you’ll enjoy our (PixelGreeds + HarDDeer) game!


Inspired by anime like "Golden Boy", I decided to make a game about a bad magician, but a good person, who by the will of fate gets into different funny and sometimes dangerous situations.

You're a Spellbreaker. And in order to "break" the Arcane fever, you have to understand its cause. To do that, you need to get all the information you can, study the area, and find the right approach to a patient.

Duration: The average duration of Season 1 is around 4-5 hours.
My goal was to make the game packaged with maximum content, and at the same time to avoid artificially stretching the gameplay, by NOT including such things as: grind, pixel hunting, rare CGIs, etc.


You play as an unskilled magician who helps people curing them from the mysterious and dangerous "Arcane fever".

Unlike other "Spellbreakers", you do not know how to feel magic, so your approach is a little different from the traditional.

On your journey you'll come across a lot of different girls with their unique personalities, problems, wishes and fetishes.


In any endeavor, it is important to understand when to be calm, gentle and neat, and when to be assertive, confident, and even a little aggressive.

The right choice of runes will allow you to succeed not only in magic, but also in love. ;)


-Comics/manga style.
H-scenes are an interactive comic book that requires using runes and different items.

-Girls
70+ unique panels. And 150+ total CGIs.

-Dialogues:
The text and the story are very important parts of the game. You'll have to properly asses the situation and choose the right solution.


Characters depicted in this game are 21 years of age or older.

You're a Spellbreaker. And in order to "break" the Arcane fever, you have to understand its cause. To do that, you need to get all the information you can, study the area, and find the right approach to a patient.

Duration: The average duration of Season 1 is around 4-5 hours.
My goal was to make the game packaged with maximum content, and at the same time to avoid artificially stretching the gameplay, by NOT including such things as: grind, pixel hunting, rare CGIs, etc.


You play as an unskilled magician who helps people curing them from the mysterious and dangerous "Arcane fever".

Unlike other "Spellbreakers", you do not know how to feel magic, so your approach is a little different from the traditional.

On your journey you'll come across a lot of different girls with their unique personalities, problems, wishes and fetishes.


In any endeavor, it is important to understand when to be calm, gentle and neat, and when to be assertive, confident, and even a little aggressive.

The right choice of runes will allow you to succeed not only in magic, but also in love. ;)


-Comics/manga style.
H-scenes are an interactive comic book that requires using runes and different items.

-Girls
70+ unique panels. And 150+ total CGIs.

-Dialogues:
The text and the story are very important parts of the game. You'll have to properly asses the situation and choose the right solution.


Characters depicted in this game are 21 years of age or older.
1357830.short_description: The misfortunes of the unskilled magician who just wanted to make some money and not get into any troubles.

1354230.detailed_description:
⭐⭐FROM OUR PARTNERS⭐⭐


💘💘💘 SECRET LABO SERIES 💘💘💘


About the Game



After your death due to a car accident, you have been summoned by the goddess to take care of a tavern in an Isekai world. Your job is to hire different girls from various tribes and races to help out the business there, as well as build up room by room of the tavern to expand the business.

Features

  • Build various types of rooms on different levels to expand your business.
  • Hire girls of various races to adapt to customers' liking.
  • Manage and assign girls to four main tasks (Food Serving, Hunting, Cleaning, and Massage) to earn money.
  • Take care of your girls and dig more into their past to know them better.
  • Gather ingredients and cook different isekai foods to serve the local customers.

Girl Hiring

Hire girls of various races to adapt to customers' liking.

Room Building

Build various types of rooms on different levels to expand your business.

Exploration Quest

Unlock dungeon and send out your staff for an exploration quest to gather extraordinary ingredients.

Cooking

Use collected special ingredients to cook isekai exotic cuisines and serve them to native customers.

Customer fetish

Assign massage staff to the correct customer based on their fetish to maximize tavern profit and popularity.

1411460.name: Z Arena
1411460.detailed_description:
Z Arena is an FPS survival game where you stand as the last line of defense against relentless waves of zombies. Featuring classic wave-based gameplay across various maps, you’ll face ever-increasing challenges while striving to survive.

There are no limits—you can keep slaying zombies as long as you want. Level up to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade them to take down enemies faster. The game also offers a "Missions" mode, with focused challenges that test your skills in different scenarios.

MISSIONS MODE




The Missions mode puts you in various scenarios where your objective is to survive and complete specific tasks. Progress through different environments and face different challenges as you take on hordes of zombies.

ENDLESS WAVES




Endless mode is a classic wave after wave of zombies. Collect achievements across different maps, experiment with new and upgraded weapons, and see how long you can last.

GAMEPLAY

The Missions mode offers a variety of objectives across diverse environments, each with unique challenges that require both strategy and quick reflexes. Whether you’re battling through tight spaces or wide-open areas overrun by zombies, every level is designed to test your survival skills. Endless mode provides limitless replayability with new achievements, levels, and powerful weapon upgrades, allowing you to eliminate hordes with style. Smooth gameplay and responsive camera controls deliver an immersive experience.

UPGRADING WEAPONS



Standard weapons in endless mode are fully upgradable, offering improvements such as better accuracy, increased ammo capacity, scopes, and more. Upgrade stations are strategically placed on each map in endless mode, ensuring that you always have the chance to enhance your arsenal.

Features

  • Missions mode with challenging objectives across various environments.
  • Endless mode with upgradable weapons and multiple maps to explore.
  • Over 15 unique enemy types with increasingly challenging behavior.
  • Timed kill streak.
  • Special super weapons.
  • Original Soundtracks.
  • Steam Achievements.

1612380.name: Combat Casino
1612380.detailed_description:
Step on to Casino Planet where everything is determined by Lady Luck! Spin the slots to determine your moves and show everyone who's the boss in this turn based roguelike RPG. Boost your Ego to unlock new classes and zones to explore!

Are you bored waiting for your queue to pop? Come on over to the Combat Casino where a run is 15-30 minutes with the oddball runs lasting a few hours. Don't worry though, there are no time limits so you can minimize and do something else if you need to. (or if you need to pay attention to the zoom call) I wanted to make something that I would want to play while waiting for some of my daily work-from-home downtime.

1637251.name: Train Simulator: Southwestern Expressways: Reading - Exeter Route Add-On
1637251.detailed_description:
Hundreds of miles and detail galore, Just Trains’ Southwestern Expressways spans 4 counties and is ready to be explored now in Train Simulator!

The Southwestern Expressways route features 3 key mainlines:

Reading to Taunton

This line is part of the larger line that connects London and Exeter while bypassing the ‘Great Way Round’ via Bristol, this is the main route for long-distance journeys between the Capital and the West Country, going via Reading West, Newbury and Westbury.

Bristol to Westbury

The line that winds its way south from Bristol to Westbury via Bath is the Heart of Wessex Line. Services on the line continue onwards towards Weymouth, making it a popular link for local trains connecting Bristol, Bradford and Westbury to the south coast.

Bristol to Exeter

The classic ‘Great Way Round’ route that extends the GWML from Bristol to Exeter via Taunton sees plenty of Great Western and cross-country services every day, with long-distance services diverting off at Taunton for the line via Westbury.

Included Scenarios


A selection of Standard and Free Roam scenarios are included:

  • 2V93 1730 Weymouth - Bristol Temple Meads
  • 1A74 05:53 Plymouth - London Paddington
  • 1M41 1006 Paignton - Manchester Piccadilly
  • 1J93 1806 London Paddington - Frome
  • 2K32 0812 Reading - Bedwyn
  • 2M17 1932 Westbury - Cheltenham Spa
  • 1C83 1219 London Paddington - Taunton
  • 1A07 06:49 Weston-Super-Mare - London Paddington
  • Westbury Free Roam
  • Bristol Temple Meads Free Roam
  • Reading Free Roam
  • Exeter St Davids Free Roam

More scenarios are available on the Steam Workshop online and in-game. Train Simulator’s Steam Workshop scenarios are free and easy to download, adding many more hours of exciting gameplay. With scenarios being added daily, why don’t you check it out now!

Key Features


  • 220 mile route set in 2010 including:
    • Reading to Taunton
    • Westbury to Bristol
    • Bristol to Exeter
  • 39 custom and detailed stations
  • Immersive scenery covering Berkshire, Wiltshire, Somerset and Devon
  • Numerous points of interest throughout the route
  • 8 Standard and 4 Free Roam scenarios
  • Quick Drive compatible
  • Download size: 2.0GB

3147620.name: Solitary Horizons
3147620.detailed_description:
After 90 years of gliding through space, meeting nothing but… nothing. You and your crew encounters a new and unexplored planet - PEARL-34.

SOLE SURVIVOR

Embark on an epic journey through the cosmic void, where you are the last beacon of hope in an unforgiving universe. In "Solitary Horizons" you find yourself alone, the sole survivor of your species, with only your trusty spacecraft and a loyal crew of robots to keep you company.

ADAPT

As your spacecraft hovers over an new and unexplored planet, your fate is inextricably linked to your ability to adapt and overcome the challenges that lie ahead. Survival in this new territory hinges on your resourcefulness, courage, and the bonds you make with your loyal robots.

EXPLORE, BUILD & UPGRADE

Your mission is to gather essential materials to sustain life on your spacecraft, all while navigating the treacherous landscapes of this alien world. You'll need to explore, build, and make tough decisions to secure your place in the universe.

Can you unlock the planet's hidden secrets, make allies among the unknown, and ensure the legacy of your kind survives in "Solitary Horizons"? The universe awaits your decision; the world is yours to explore.

1901620.name: Dungeon Travelers: To Heart 2 in Another World
1901620.detailed_description:
Recruit a huge cast of friends from four different base classes that branch into over a dozen variations, and always build the best party for the job! Explore one long, twisting dungeon that only gets more perilous the further you go, with plenty of optional quests and side areas to unlock! The original Dungeon Travelers game takes place in a separate world from the others, drawing characters instead from the fan-beloved world of the PS2 anime classic To Heart 2.

Prepare at the Guild!
Whenever you stop for a respite from exploring, you can identify your new gear, reequip and restructure your team, or even upgrade your characters' classes along branching paths!

Explore the Dungeon!
The Auto-Map function will fill in the grid with each step, letting you know where you are and where you've been. Be careful, though! Don't try to go too far at once...

Battle & Collect Monsters!
The deeper you delve into the dungeon, the more dangerous the monsters will become. You'll need tactics to counter each new threat—and what better way to get to know your foes than by weakening them and sealing them into your book for study?

Strategize and Win!
With every battle you'll amass more gold, EXP, and items. It's up to you whether to press on, or to head back outside to power up for later!

STORY
When I awoke, there was fantasy stuff everywhere⸺
What kind of adventure could be in store? And will there be any way home when it's all said and done?!

It all started after class in the student council room.
Takaaki and all his friends had been gathered to test some unquestionably suspicious if not downright dangerous game—or "full-body immersive RPG experience," in the words of its inimitable creator Ma-ryan.
The play-test was only questionably voluntary.

The game started to launch. A bright flash filled the room...
When Takaaki opened his eyes, he was somewhere he didn't recognize.
His friends Konomi and Tamaki were kitted out in full fantasy gear, and when he looked more closely, he realized he was too.

Were they in the game? Forget that—how would they get out?
Only one lead presented itself. "In the depths of the dungeon located nearby, there lives the god who created this world..."
But who could it be?

In search of more clues and hopefully some answers, the party set out into the dungeon...

CHARACTERS


Konomi Yuzuhara (Voice: Yurina Hase)
Takaaki's childhood friend, one year younger, who lives next door.
She's fond of fortune-telling and food and has a dog named Genjimaru.
Likes to look after people but isn't much good at it.



Tamaki Kousaka (Voice: Shizuka Ito)
One year older than Takaaki and Konomi, she was always the boss of their motley crew.
The heiress of an old family, skilled at cooking, cleaning, martial arts, and academia.
Her hobbies include antiques collecting and historical dramas. Very bad with dogs.



Manaka Komaki (Voice: Noriko Rikimaru)
Takaaki's classmate and class president. Formerly the class vice president.
As a big snacker, she's turned a certain storage area into a secret tea room.
She isn't very assertive, but has been friends with Yuma since middle school.



Karin Sasamori (Voice: Saki Nakajima)
A girl who loves paranormal phenomena… and also egg sandwiches.
Blessed with boundless curiosity and energy, but doesn't look before she leaps.
The founder and fearless leader of the Mystery Club. Join today!



Sango Himeyuri (Voice: Sayori Ishizuka)
Ruri Himeyuri's older twin sister. One year under Takaaki.
A genius at computers and a major fan of red bean butter bread.
Lives at her own pace, doing what she wants, when she wants.



Ruri Himeyuri (Voice: Konami Yoshida)
Sango Himeyuri's younger twin sister. One year under Takaaki.
Emotional and unacademic, she practices jealousy and stubbornness as art forms.
On the other hand, she's good at housework, and loves Sango more than anyone.



Yuma Tonami (Voice: Hitomi Nabatame)
A girl who sees everything as a contest: You can win or lose, and she wants to win.
She's constantly challenging Takaaki, but almost never comes out on top.
She must have been born under an unlucky star. Most things she does backfire.



Lucy Maria Misora (Voice: Rio Natsuki)
A space alien from Planet Luu, the third planet orbiting 47 Ursae Majoris… or is she?
She's certainly an odd girl, with her own language and the power to get drunk on soda.
Attends classes only when she feels like it, but no one seems to mind.



Yuki Kusakabe (Voice: Rina Sato)
An old classmate of Takaaki's who thinks everything "seems like fate."
Never seen without the fancy notebook that she seems to carry everywhere.
Likes black tea, though it burns her tongue. Seems to be primarily nocturnal?



Sasara Kusugawa (Voice: Ryoko Ono)
The student council president, formerly the vice president under Ma-ryan.
Afflicted by a strange condition that causes her body to reject food made with love.
An unabashed aficionado of soft and slimy animals.



Ma-ryan (Voice: Ema Kogure)
Real name: Unknown. Age: 14 forever in her heart. Moonlights as a voice actress.
Even post-graduation, she comes and goes in the student council office like she owns the place.
The definition of a troublemaker. Full of mischief and mysteries.



Harumi Kouno (Voice: Kotomi Yamakawa)
A girl who transferred in one day and started calling Takaaki "Darling."
Her true name is HMX-17b Milfa, and she was previously in the body of a teddy bear.
She's always arguing with her little sister Silfa.



HMX-17c Silfa (Voice: Harumi Sakurai)
The youngest of the three maid sisters has a distinctive speech impediment.
With a phobia of human interaction, she hides in a cardboard box when she's upset.
The maid uniform she always wears comes courtesy of Yuji.



Chie Yoshioka (Voice: Kaori Ota)
Konomi's close friend, nicknamed Yocchi.
She's known Konomi since middle school and Michiru Yamada since kindergarten.
Bright and cheerful—and also weird and kind of nosy, but a good person at heart.



Michiru Yamada (Voice: Akira Kasahara)
Konomi's close friend, nicknamed Charu.
She's known Konomi since middle school and Chie Yoshioka since kindergarten.
Normally collected and wryly witty, but her family's work is weighing on her lately.



Ikuno Komaki (Voice: Chiro Kanzaki)
Manaka Komaki's little sister. She normally uses a wheelchair.
Always worried about her sister's trusting nature, she's keeping a close eye
on Takaaki, whom her sister is fond of. Cynical and often bitingly sarcastic.



Nanako (Voice: Kayo Sakata)
An innocent girl who loves Takaaki, or "Takky," like a big brother.
She's also more of a go-getter than you might expect: in the past,
she's roped Takaaki and others into a quest to find a magic user.



Haruka Yuzuhara (Voice: Chieko Honda)
Konomi's mother, and a sort of second mother-figure to Takaaki.
She looks and acts considerably younger than she is and has a wealth of hobbies.
Specialties: Killer Curry, thorough discipline, and loving her husband.



HMX-17a Ilfa (Voice: Emiko Hagiwara)
A maid robot whom Milfa and Silfa can call their big sister.
Specially equipped by Sango with software that gives her a people-loving heart.
Normally she seems sweet and demure, but don't make her angry!

2051550.name: Heart Abyss Demo
2051550.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Demo

Break your chains. Find your sister. Take your revenge.

You are Leon.

You are a jinko – half-man, half-fox.


The chi boils in your blood. Neither hunters nor yōkai will stop you from finding your sister. To complete your goal, you will have to set out on an dangerous adventure into the lands of the Human Empire.

Furious action.
Tear foes apart with your bare hands; dice them with a sword; squash them with a hammer, and use bloody finishers to end their lives. Fight your way through hordes of enemies.

Master NINKO powers.
The energy of chi permeates through all life and grants you inhuman powers. Learn unique skills and moves to harness your chi in battle.

Japanese vibes.
The setting of Heart Abyss is inspired by the Japanese culture and mythology. Meet creatures of legend; becoming their friends or tearing them to pieces. Nobody will stop you.

2051550.short_description: Heart Abyss is a brutal action-platformer inspired by Japan during the 17th and 18th centuries. Wake up your inner beast and take vengeance on those who put a collar around your neck. Find your sister and uncover the mystery behind the disappearance of all jinkos.

2054770.name: Combo Card Clashers
2054770.detailed_description:
Combo Card Clashers, a roguelike deckbuilder meets auto battler with unique card combo battle mechanics. What makes the game unique and different from other deck-building games is the innovative Card Combo Grid which allows powerful card synergies to be built every turn.

Each turn, you add a card to the combo grid and play all cards in grid. Experiment with the different card synergies and grid placement to unlock powerful effects. Duplicate, modify, and enhance cards to unleash more potential! Build up damage and slay enemies with no-nonsense attacks, blast them with magic spells, or torture them with negative effects - all in one turn!

A good team could also lead you to victory. Other than recruiting mercenaries in stores, you could also befriend monsters after combat to become your allies! Their special abilities could just be that trick up your sleeve to win the next fight.

The main game offers three heroes, each with their own unique style and strength. Customize the attributes of each hero and craft their starting deck to maximize their abilities. You can also level up, equip gear, find relics and learn skills to open up new roads to progression.

Embark on a journey, Discover events, buy new cards, upgrade cards, get weapons and gear, recruiting monsters and mercenaries, discover relics, and using strategy to win intense tactical battles!

Game Features:

  • 5 characters! - customize your hero

  • 100+ cards & 60 artifacts - build powerful synergies

  • Free hex maps & procedural generation - new encounters each time

  • Gear and Mercenary Store - You can even recruit monsters to fight for you

  • 3 worlds & 10 levels - Replayability won't be an issue

*Combo Card Clashers is part of Erabit's Bud Scheme, a space for game creativity & solo devs/small teams to thrive.

2075410.name: 初夏倾语 - Summer Whisper
2075410.detailed_description:
《初夏倾语》是一款恋爱题材的视觉小说游戏，你需要扮演女主角钟小芳，跟活泼可爱的青梅连小婧经历一段初夏时节的苦涩青春，最终完成人生的蜕变。

故事介绍：
普普通通的女生钟小芳有一个从小到大的青梅连小婧。
本来说好先当朋友，小婧她居然跟学校外面的女生有神神秘秘的往来。
为此，就算是温柔的小芳也想要宣誓自己的主权。
而从来叛逆的小婧又会有什么想法呢。
纯情青涩时期的恋爱就此展开。

游戏特色：
青涩纯情的百合恋爱
全立绘角色语音
应景柔美的音乐
明媚细致的cg
青春可爱的剧情

2123050.name: TAKIBI
2123050.detailed_description:
The game itself is a very simple mechanism.
During the day, you gather resources, and at night, you connect your life with the flame.
If the flame goes out at night or if the fire is not lit by night, that's the end of the game.
You can use the points you earn to upgrade your equipment to make it more survivable, and then try again.
You can try to see how many days you can survive.
Or just stare into the flames.
It is important to take time to quiet your mind and forget the fatigue of daily life.
This game provides players with such time.

2123050.short_description: Forgetting the busyness and coldness of daily life, we sometimes gaze at the flames and then at ourselves. It would be nice to have such a time.

2270600.name: Open At Nine
2270600.detailed_description:
💟Add in WishList!!💟


About the Game


💟 Synopsis 💟
“Massive debt, a shabby brothel, and a naughty succubus… This is all I get for defeating the Demon God?!” Hire monster girls to attract customers and pay off your debts! Don't forget to give your girls lots of hands-on job training!

💟 Gameplay 💟
Open at Nine is a brothel management simulation game. Pair your girls with the right clients and assign them a room based on their preferences. Earn money based on customer satisfaction to pay off your debt. Use your “mighty sword” to level up your monster girls by initiating intimate “job training” sessions.



💟 Features 💟
- Delight your girls and your clients with a variety of themed rooms!
- Immerse yourself in a moving storyline!
- Enjoy 20 different H-scenes filled with animated CGs and embarrassingly lewd scenarios!
- Spend time with all sorts of monster girls, each with their own personality quirks!

2487680.name: Burger Kombat
2487680.detailed_description:
Welcome to the Burger Kombat Kitchen!

In this virtual kitchen, there is no logic – ingredients randomly appear on your table every couple hours. All you can do is hope that your culinary skills will be enough to figure out what can be prepared from them! Combine various ingredients to create new burgers and amaze everyone with your mastery of cooking from the most absurd and incompatible products.

The rarer the product, the cooler the burger.

Collect the rarest ingredients to make the most expensive burgers out of them. In the Burger Kombat's kitchen, the main indicator of a chef's mastery is the ability to make burgers that people would want to pay any amount of money for!

And remember the main thing – this game will not teach you how to cook delicious burgers, it will teach you how to cook EXPENSIVE burgers.

3050760.name: Sidereal Dominion: Avalon
3050760.detailed_description:
Sidereal Dominion: Avalon is an indie strategy game where you command an interstellar empire, controlling its expansion through the galaxy and directly controlling your fleets in real-time space battles.

Features

  • Play on a map of the Milky Way and directly command your fleets in real-time battles .

  • Play premade governments, or make your own custom colony by mixing traits and making a flag.

  • Reclaim Earth, or terraform a new homeworld for humanity .

  • Interact with a simulated economy that automatically adjusts production of goods. Micromanage your population as much or as little as you want .

  • Build mines and monopolize resources to obtain bonuses.

  • Shift your government’s structure on a political chart, unlocking different mechanics to use.

  • The game always starts the same but adds procedural elements as time goes on.

2497560.name: SKIBIDI: ESCAPE FROM TOILETS!
2497560.detailed_description:
SKIBIDI: ESCAPE FROM TOILETS

Is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players. TV MANs are trying to get through creepy and atmospheric locations that are filled with dangerous SKIBIDI - they want to kill you! TV MANs - UNITE!

Immersive experience

Realistic graphics, minimal user interfaces and a gloomy atmosphere will ensure immersion in the game.

Cooperative

You are a TV MANs team that is up against dangerous SKIBIDI. They want to kill you, the only chance to survive and get out of creepy places is to act together and cover for each other!

Unique levels

There are many unique levels waiting for you, each with its own atmosphere and mystery. You can find a way out with your bright screen, which not only illuminates the way, but also helps with a bright flash in the fight against SKIBIDI!

Updates

Many new locations will be added for free and regularly, and new mechanics will be introduced so that you can spend endless time in the game with your friends.

2972310.name: Herald of the Mists
2972310.detailed_description:
As the herald of the Queen, you're tasked with unraveling the truth behind the disappearance of her lost army. Embark on a mysterious adventure through a mist-shrouded world and uncover the secrets hidden behind it. Dive into the depths of intrigue and betrayal as you navigate a realm where nothing is as it seems. How far will you go to achieve your goal?



Define your character through your actions and choices. Will you become a cunning rogue, a formidable mage, a valiant fighter, or something in between? The choice is yours. You are travelling all the time, so what you decide to carry with yourself is equally important. Your decisions will carve your path.



Immerse yourself in a narrative-driven RPG full of choices and dice rolls. Engage in meaningful interactions with a diverse cast of characters, each with their own stories to tell and secrets to uncover. Navigate a web of alliances and rivalries as you forge relationships with factions and people throughout The Mists.

Features


  • Embark on a dark fantasy adventure.
  • Define your herald with minimalist and flexible character customization.
  • Become a rogue, mage, fighter, or anything in between.
  • Meet, fight, love dozens of NPCs.
  • Learn the truth. No matter the cost.

2985890.name: EleBall
2985890.detailed_description:
EleBall is a casual platformer about a circus elephant, who tries their best to catch falling objects while simultaneously keeping balance on a bouncy ball.

Gameplay

Keep your balance, while simultaneously holding falling objects. The better you do, the more the crowd'll like it. Adjust to the situation in order to survive in the harsh world of circus.

Customization

The better you are at your job, the more money you earn. You can use it to buy new outfits and balls for the elephant. With over 40 unique items, pick your favourites to really make your dream elephant.

Freeplay

Tired of playing against a timer? Want to practice playing or just mess around with different modifiers? Then check out the freeplay mode, where you can pick any level background and music along with modifiers to suit your experience. Want to fly to space? Just decrease the gravity!

Story

Progressing through the game, you'll uncover bits and pieces of the life at the EleBall Circus. How will it all end?

3014520.name: BrokenLore: LOW
3014520.detailed_description:
WISHLIST NOW


About the Game

BrokenLore: LOW takes players on a journey filled with tension, mystery, and the supernatural, where every corner of the mist hides forgotten truths and unfathomable horrors.

Set in a remote Japanese village, Kirisame Mura (Village of the Mist), this first-person horror game delves into the dark prelude of the story narrated in UNFOLLOW.

GAME OBJECTIVES
➤ Reveal the Roots of Deep-Seated Hatred
➤ Explore the circular, claustrophobic pathway structure of Kirisame Mura
➤ Introduce the Game Loop Structure, symbolizing the unstoppable cycle of tragic events

STORY
Naomi Montgomery arrives at Kirisame Mura for a professional opportunity that promises to launch her music career but instead finds herself facing sinister presences and the cursed secrets of the village. Her story is a journey through time and memory, laying the groundwork for the events narrated in BrokenLore: UNFOLLOW.

The aura of mystery surrounding the village intensifies with the gradual revelation of a dark legend that haunts the town. The legend tells that, at the center of the village, there was an ancient temple, now disappeared, the scene of a tragedy that has cursed all its inhabitants.

GAMEPLAY MECHANICS
➤ Sinister manifestations suggest ancient forces keeping watch over the village.
➤ Survival requires players to hide from enemies instead of confronting them directly.
➤ Discovering diaries and letters provides historical and emotional context.
➤ Lost stories are unveiled as players navigate through the village's winding paths.

VILLAGE THEMES
Kirisame Mura is designed to be an enigma in itself, a labyrinth with no exit that symbolizes the cycle of wrong decisions and broken destinies of the protagonist. The game’s structure emphasizes this aspect with an environment that subtly repeats and changes, challenging players to find a way to break the cycle as they delve into the story. Themes of envy, ambition, and failure will be explored.

Follow BrokenLore on our Social Media!

2543770.name: It Was Raining That Night
2543770.detailed_description:
Step into the shoes of a young security guard entangled in the gritty underworld of the mafia. Your life has been anything but ordinary, marked by a dark past you're determined to escape. The boss's daughter is smitten with you, but lurking in the shadows are formidable foes with the power to shatter your world and your loved ones. Immerse yourself in the treacherous criminal landscape and uncover the twists and turns of your potential destiny. Will you rise or fall in this captivating tale of crime, love, and redemption?




"It Was Raining That Night" is a story-based game set in the dangerous mafia underworld. As a young security guard with a dark past, you must navigate treacherous paths, face formidable foes, and navigate a complex web of love and danger. Your choices will determine your destiny in this thrilling tale of crime, love, and redemption. Don't miss the chance to experience a gripping narrative where every decision matters. Will you rise or fall in this captivating world?

2677930.name: SleepWalk
2677930.detailed_description:
Sleepwalk is an independent first-person horror and survival game. Players wake up in an unknown location with no memories and embark on a journey to uncover the story and escape, solving complex puzzles while being pursued by mysterious threats. The oppressive atmosphere, immersive gameplay, and the intensity of the chases make Sleepwalk a distressing and engaging experience for fans of horror and survival games. Get ready to face your fears and unravel the dark secrets of this nightmare.

Game Time: 2-3 Hours (Depends on Player)


Plot:

The plot of Sleepwalk begins with the player waking up in a completely unknown location, plunged into darkness and devoid of any memory of how they got there. The protagonist embarks on a journey of discovery of history, as he desperately tries to escape the sinister place in which he finds himself. Each new step is an opportunity to uncover the hidden secrets behind this harrowing experience.

Gameplay:

The game Sleepwalk challenges players to complete complex puzzles and solve intriguing riddles as part of their quest for freedom. First-person mechanics heighten the sense of immersion, immersing players in the game's dark and oppressive world.

Agonizing Persecutions:

One of the most striking characteristics of Sleepwalk is the intensity of the chases throughout the narrative. Players constantly find themselves in life-or-death situations, forced to flee from mysterious and terrifying threats that lurk around the environment. The agony of being chased creates palpable tension, keeping players on the edge of their seats.

Environment and Atmosphere:

Sleepwalk is meticulously designed to create an atmosphere of authentic horror. The graphics and soundtrack contribute to the feeling of helplessness and isolation, while environmental design elements add to the feeling of mystery and constant fear.

Features:

1 - Realistic Graphics: Sleepwalk stands out for its realistic graphics, which immerse players in a dark and detailed world, increasing the feeling of immersion.

2 - Secret History of the Protagonist: An intriguing feature of the game is the secret history of the protagonist. Players can gradually uncover the details of their mysterious past as they progress through the narrative, creating an added element of suspense and motivation.

3 - Descriptive Letters and Documents: Players can collect letters and documents throughout the game, which offer insights and clues about the game's history and world. These objects provide an additional layer of depth to the narrative, encouraging exploration and immersion.

4 - Dark and Enigmatic Environment: The game presents a sinister and enigmatic environment, full of secrets and mysteries. Players are challenged to explore every corner of the scenario, looking for clues and solutions to puzzles while facing an atmosphere of constant terror.

5 - Puzzle Challenges: Sleepwalk offers a series of complex puzzle challenges, which players must solve to advance the narrative and escape the unknown location. These puzzles increase interactivity and player engagement while maintaining the survival aspect of the game.
2677930.about_the_game:
Sleepwalk is an independent first-person horror and survival game. Players wake up in an unknown location with no memories and embark on a journey to uncover the story and escape, solving complex puzzles while being pursued by mysterious threats. The oppressive atmosphere, immersive gameplay, and the intensity of the chases make Sleepwalk a distressing and engaging experience for fans of horror and survival games. Get ready to face your fears and unravel the dark secrets of this nightmare.

Game Time: 2-3 Hours (Depends on Player)


Plot:

The plot of Sleepwalk begins with the player waking up in a completely unknown location, plunged into darkness and devoid of any memory of how they got there. The protagonist embarks on a journey of discovery of history, as he desperately tries to escape the sinister place in which he finds himself. Each new step is an opportunity to uncover the hidden secrets behind this harrowing experience.

Gameplay:

The game Sleepwalk challenges players to complete complex puzzles and solve intriguing riddles as part of their quest for freedom. First-person mechanics heighten the sense of immersion, immersing players in the game's dark and oppressive world.

Agonizing Persecutions:

One of the most striking characteristics of Sleepwalk is the intensity of the chases throughout the narrative. Players constantly find themselves in life-or-death situations, forced to flee from mysterious and terrifying threats that lurk around the environment. The agony of being chased creates palpable tension, keeping players on the edge of their seats.

Environment and Atmosphere:

Sleepwalk is meticulously designed to create an atmosphere of authentic horror. The graphics and soundtrack contribute to the feeling of helplessness and isolation, while environmental design elements add to the feeling of mystery and constant fear.

2626860.name: Dragon Eclipse
2626860.detailed_description:
Important information to consider before purchasing this game in early access:

  • The game is still in development. You might encounter various smaller or bigger bugs, balance issues, and a lack of final polish.

  • We’re open to any feedback. We believe that together, we can create the best deckbuilding experience possible!

  • Your saved data may become corrupted or wiped with large patches and version changes.

  • Gamepads may not work properly (which will be changed in the future), so a keyboard + mouse setup is strongly recommended.

  • The game is playable on Steam Deck, but as gamepad controls are not finished, you will have to use the trackpad frequently.

  • Right now, only English is supported, but in the future, we’ll expand the list of available languages

In Dragon Eclipse, you'll discover and collect magical Mystlings—creatures you can befriend and use in battle. Not only will you craft your deck of cards, but you'll also assemble a team of three Mystlings, each with unique stats, abilities, and dedicated cards. As you progress, your Mystlings will grow stronger and evolve! Utilize their abilities in deckbuilding to create breathtaking combos with every run. But beware—the Eclipse is coming!

Combining team battler mechanics with deck-building strategy opens up endless fun and inventive combinations. After every run, you'll unlock new Mystlings, cards, and higher difficulty levels, keeping the game exciting for a long time. Experiment with different setups, create amazing combos, boost your stats, and engage each team member uniquely to achieve the impossible!

Your choice of tamer determines your starting deck and pool of cards. Each tamer has a distinct playstyle and unique specialization, so choose wisely to face whatever destiny awaits!

Every Mystling has unique stats, abilities, and a starting card for your deck. Strategically balance your team, make them your loyal companions, and together, fight against the encroaching evil.

Mystlings level up and evolve during combat, gaining powerful new abilities. You’ll have to discover and harness their potential. They may look sweet, but in the hands of a skilled tamer, they can become deadly weapons able to dominate the battlefields!

Throughout your journey, you'll construct a powerful deck full of great combos. Acquire new cards from various sources, engage in battles, complete side quests, and meet intriguing characters to ensure your deck is tailored to your combat needs and preferences.

Time is crucial in gameplay. The Eclipse is approaching, limiting the time you have to gather cards and resources. Make strategic decisions and choose your path wisely, as some valuables will have to be sacrificed for the greater good.

Ready to become the best tamer out there? Start your journey now!

2618940.name: Desktop Pet Project
2618940.detailed_description:
Tired of doing your daily chores?
Think you need to break up the gray, lonely days at your computer?
Do you want to be interrupted for fun?

Desktop Pet Project is designed to do just that.

Inspired by such a wonderful invention as Shimeji, Desktop Pet Project has tried to collect the most interesting and curious mechanics.
  • You can summon up to four pets that will have slight personalities in behavior.
  • You can give them names.
  • Several cats of several colors are available by default.
  • You can also import your favorite Shimeji by going through Shimeji Import Manager (downloadable shimeji, not browser extension) and customize your pet's behavior in a certain way.
  • Support Steam Workshop, which will allow you get the community-created pets.
  • Don't forget to feed your pets.
  • You can play several mini-games with your pets.
  • Pets need sleep, so it is not recommended to interrupt their sleep.
  • Pets don't like to be dragged around the screen, who would like that? But with the help of a treat you can peacefully move the pet to another place.
  • If you treat them poorly, pets will surely remind you how important it is to treat them well (you can turn it off, but it is not recommended).
  • They sometimes will play with some mouses on screen (you can disable this, but then it would be less fun).
  • A pet creation manager for creative individuals that allows you to fine-tune the interaction and each sprite. Once created, you can easy upload to Steam Workshop.

2656330.name: Meta Soulmate
2656330.detailed_description:
Meta Soulmate is a virtual mate creation tool that allows you to craft your own virtual companion through a game-style character customization tool. With it, you can debut as a VTuber or create your own secret friend.

Implement the excitement of beginning in our own way

This project aims to convey the excitement felt when creating oneself or another character while enjoying various games or services. Materialize the emotions of that experience and feel the thrill of completing the project.

Your own character with infinite possibilities.

The possibilities of your own character are endless. Especially for VTubers, we plan to provide an all-in-one tool, allowing you to debut as a VTuber in the easiest way possible.

Costume parts that maximize a multitude of possibilities

Efforts were made to divide all costumes into individual parts, maximizing a myriad of possibilities, allowing you to express each soulmate’s individuality beyond simply predefined costume templates.

Texture editing feature designed to create Soulmates with true uniqueness

You can freely edit not only the costumes but also the textures of face and body, allowing for a truly unique Soulmate. Showcase your skills to create a one-of-a-kind Soulmate that is exclusively yours!

Meta Soulmate's unique and easy makeup method

Meta Soulmate introduces a new approach to makeup editing, allowing for both freedom and simplicity. Save your character's portrait as a standard 2D image file. Edit the image in any way you like, and those changes will seamlessly reflect on the 3D character.

Future of Meta Soulmate

Beyond the initial excitement, we are preparing various contents for you to freely enjoy with the Meta Soulmates you create. They will be gradually released through Steam. Look forward to the unique experience laid before you and your Meta Soulmate!

2729480.name: NightClub Simulator
2729480.detailed_description:
Night Club Simulator is a highly immersive VR game with a great degree of freedom. It uses a fully physics-based animation system to simulate NPC behaviors and reactions, allowing you to interact with them as if you were in the real world. NPCs have realistic AI, displaying emotions such as happiness, anger, fear, or affection. Their emotions will change depending on your actions. You can provoke and fight with anyone, dance and kiss with girls, but be careful when approaching a girl as her boyfriend might be around. Experience a lifelike and interactive night club adventure with Night Club Simulator.

there are several ways you can interact with NPCs:
1, wave your hand; (increase 5-10 relationship points)
2, clap hands when a npc is dancing, the palm relative and clap; (increase 10-15 relationship points)
3, shake hand, reach out one hand to a npc; (increase 10-20 relationship points)
4, dancing, the palm up, reach out one hand to a npc; (opposite sex only, Requires relationship points of 40 or more)
5, hug and kiss, open arms, reach out double hands to a npc. (opposite sex only, Requires relationship points of 60 or more)
6, drinking, close to a sitting NPC, wave your hand first, then hold a cup and raise hand on air.
7, throw money to a npc, you will get relationship with him.

2775910.name: Infinite Blue
2775910.detailed_description:
An Immersive Ocean Animal Exploration Game

Dive into the world of Infinite Blue, an expansive underwater exploration game where you can become countless different ocean animals and swim through a beautifully realistic ocean environment.

A Massive Roster of Aquatic Animals

Discover 50 unique species for you to embody on your journey through the depths. Small tropical fish, eight-legged cephalopods, sea turtles, stingray, sharks, whales and much more!

An Endless Circle of Life

You are what you eat and you become what eats you. Experience both perma-death and never-death as you will always become another animal after dying.

Procedurally Generated Reefs

Using a hybrid combination of procedural generation and hand-crafted environments you can explore the massive environment that changes every play while retaining a variety of unique feeling areas.

Physically Simulated Creatures

Realtime physics bodies help create complex movements for the unique physiologies of the sea, bringing incredible life and realism to their interactions with the environment around them.

A Massive World To Explore

Discover all the wonders of the world from the glistening shallows of Red Reef to the deep trench bottoms of The Abyss. You'll want to see every inch of this world as certain species are unique to their particular environment. You never know what might be lurking in the depths...

SeaTuber Mode

A special feature I added for V-Tubers and content creators that will sync your animals mouth with your microphone output allowing them to become your avatar for more immersive RP. Truly innovation at it's finest and not a silly idea that made me laugh.

Developer Disclaimer:
Infinite Blue is my first game using Unreal Engine and was built in around 6 months as a learning project for me to test out the many tools and features UE5 has to offer. It lacks some of the more complex RPG elements my other simulators have and is more of a Sandbox / Exploration experience. I hope you enjoy it and get an idea of the possibilities we'll have going forward with the new engine.

2810780.name: Forsaken Frontiers
2810780.detailed_description:
join our discord


About the Game

In the year 1988, a chilling cataclysm transformed the world into an icy wasteland, claiming the lives of the majority. Now, the surviving few face a new threat—an insurmountable debt, the price of securing their lives aboard the safety of their debtor's train.

Key Features

12-Player Co-op: Immerse yourself in a gripping cooperative adventure up to 12 players. Explore the frozen unknown, where effective teamwork is paramount for survival.

Proximity Voice Chat: Communicate with other players based on proximity, adding a realistic and immersive layer to your cooperative efforts.

PSX-Inspired Aesthetics: Step into the mesmerizing world of our PSX-inspired aesthetics, blending modern graphics with the nostalgic charm of the 90s era.

Analog Horrors Beyond Imagination: Face unimaginable horrors in a unique analog style that blurs the line between reality and nightmare. Encounter terrors that challenge your perception and sanity.

Persistent Character: Craft a unique identity with a character that persists across all saves and servers. Your consistent persona ensures a cohesive and personalized experience.

Detailed Eerie Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in the moody atmosphere of Forsaken Frontiers, where the warmth of the train contrasts sharply with the cold desolation beyond its confines.

Procedurally Generated Environments: Navigate vast, ever-changing landscapes across five distinct settings: a sprawling Metro, an eerie Hotel, a labyrinthine Hospital, claustrophobic Maintenance Tunnels, and the secretive Pentagon. Each offers unique challenges, with more environments planned post-launch.

Immersive HUD-Less Design: Immerse yourself fully in the chilling atmosphere without traditional on-screen distractions. UI elements seamlessly integrate into the DataDeck, a wrist computer, enhancing realism and immersion.

Volumetric Audio: Immersive 3D sound with realistic echoes and muffling through walls, enhancing spatial awareness and atmosphere.

Game Modes

Endless Mode: Experience the core gameplay of gathering resources from diverse locations to pay off your endlessly increasing debt.

Nightmare Mode: For those seeking a heightened challenge, Nightmare Mode presents a more intense and terrifying version of the standard experience.

Escape Mode: Search for the lone elevator to the surface while gathering essential gear for survival. Every corridor could be your path to freedom - or your last.

Procedurally Generated Environments: Navigate vast, ever-changing landscapes across five distinct settings: a sprawling Metro, an eerie Hotel, a labyrinthine Hospital, claustrophobic Maintenance Tunnels, and the secretive Pentagon. Each offers unique challenges, with more environments planned post-launch.

Immersive HUD-Less Design: Immerse yourself fully in the chilling atmosphere without traditional on-screen distractions. UI elements seamlessly integrate into the DataDeck, a wrist computer, enhancing realism and immersion.

Volumetric Audio: Immersive 3D sound with realistic echoes and muffling through walls, enhancing spatial awareness and atmosphere.

Game Modes

Endless Mode: Experience the core gameplay of gathering resources from diverse locations to pay off your endlessly increasing debt.

Nightmare Mode: For those seeking a heightened challenge, Nightmare Mode presents a more intense and terrifying version of the standard experience.

Escape Mode: Search for the lone elevator to the surface while gathering essential gear for survival. Every corridor could be your path to freedom - or your last.
2810780.short_description: Step into the frozen unknown in Forsaken Frontiers, a cooperative analog horror adventure set in the unforgiving embrace of an everlasting winter.

2838550.name: The Monarch: First Light
2838550.detailed_description:
Full Release


About the Game



The Monarch is a Kingdom-like strategy game that has minimalistic control & smooth gameplay with power-up aspects. The gates of hell open each night, terrorizing the land. As the player, you must find a way to destroy the gates and defend your lands in the process!

Gather coins, recruit peasants, train units, build powerful structures, gain power-ups, and adapt!

Can you bring peace to the land?

New Player Tips

  • If you take a hit, you lose a coin. Hold a few extra coins in your pouch just to be safe!
  • Build and upgrade your walls as soon as possible!
  • Try to recruit at least 1 peasant every day!
  • The forest is dangerous at night; watch out!

2843410.name: Everloop
2843410.detailed_description:
You are trapped in an endless hallway. Observe your surroundings carefully to reach your destiny.

  • Stay alert to anomalies.
  • When you encounter an anomaly, go back.
  • If you do not find anomalies, move forward.
  • Every lit candle is a step towards your destiny.


In Everloop, you find yourself trapped in an endless hallway, where every step and glance are crucial to unraveling the path to your destiny. A journey of observation, reflection, and discovery. Where reality intertwines with the surreal, your perception is your greatest ally.

Key Features:


  • Detailed Exploration: Navigate through a mysterious corridor, filled with details and secrets waiting to be discovered. Each element of the environment could be the key to moving forward or a sign to retreat.
  • Mysterious Anomalies: Stay alert to any changes in your surroundings. Anomalies are both a challenge and a guide, bringing you closer to freedom or casting you back to the start.
  • Important Decisions: Choose wisely when to advance or retreat. Each decision impacts your path and will reveal new secrets.
  • Anomaly Codex: Discover and delve into the lore of Everloop with the Anomaly Codex, a detailed compilation of all the anomalies you will encounter, offering insights and stories that enrich the game experience and deepen the mystery of the infinite hallway.

  • Visible Progress: With every candle lit, you are one step closer to solving the mystery of the corridor and reaching your destiny. Each flame is a milestone in your journey.
  • Play Time: 15-60 minutes

1208110.name: Prometheus Wept
1208110.detailed_description:
About

Prometheus Wept is a party and action point turn based RPG, which offers hardcore squad-level combat, simultaneous battles between cyberspace and the physical world, meaningful choices, deep character progression and an advanced crafting system.

Imagine a near-future earth in which digital technology has become even more integrated and essential to daily life. Imagine the sudden corruption of all this technology, in less than a day, by a potent virus, which affects everything from the smart kettle in your home to automated agriculture and transport systems. Imagine generations of chaos, widespread loss of life, technical understanding, and the fragmenting of nations into insular city states. Assume the role of a wandering Classical Technologist surviving among the splintered remnants of humanity, searching for and attempting to restore the technological relics of humanity's golden age.

Looking for Something to Play in the Meantime?

Developing a game is a slow and meticulous process and it's going to take time to make Prometheus Wept the best game it can be. If you are looking for something to play in the mean-time, check out Vigilantes!

Key Features

  • System infiltration: Transfer your character's consciousness into the treacherous environment of a corrupted computer system, while allies protect you from physical world threats. Employ a range of scripts (abilities) to overcome corrupted system security, and commandeer physical world systems like defenses and doors from within the machine.

  • Turn (AP) and Party Based Tactical Combat: battle it out with a variety of melee, ranged and explosive weapons, with aimed and special attacks, powerful perk-based abilities, attacks of opportunity and more.

  • Use The Environment To Your Advantage: Destroy cover to leave enemies exposed, use a variety of environmental objects against your foes, and exploit interactions between the primal forces of fire, water and electricity to your advantage.

  • Deep Character Progression: Build your team using the ADAPTED character system, which comprises 7 stats, 17 skills and a huge variety of perks. Throughout the game, you will meet and ally with exceptional individuals, each with their own unique set of perks.

  • Meaningful Choices, Little and Large: Will you pay an odd, roadside priest for a blessing or ignore him? Will you help overthrow a questionable oligarchy, or cement their position against growing unrest? After all, in the post virus world, civilized is a relative term.

  • Deep Crafting System: Create a large variety of weapons, armour, explosives, gadgets, combat stims and medical supplies. The quality of the crafted item is determined by the quality of the blueprints you possess, your crafting skill and the quality of the components used.
